as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
Read our Composition guide for more details.
asChild.description_zh:
更改作为子级传递的元素的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。
请阅读我们的作文指南，了解更多详情。

calendarLabel.description: The accessible label for the calendar

defaultValue.description: The default value for the calendar

dir.description: The reading direction of the calendar when applicable.  If omitted, inherits globally from ConfigProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: 日历的阅读方向（如果适用）。 如果省略，则全局继承自 ConfigProvider 或采用 LTR（从左到右）读取模式。

disabled.description: Whether or not the calendar is disabled

fixedWeeks.description: Whether or not to always display 6 weeks in the calendar
fixedWeeks.description_zh: 是否始终在日历中显示 6 周

initialFocus.description: If true, the calendar will focus the selected day, today, or the first day of the month depending on what is visible when the calendar is mounted
initialFocus.description_zh: 如果为 true，则日历将聚焦选定的日期、今天或当月的第一天，具体取决于装载日历时可见的内容

isDateDisabled.description: A function that returns whether or not a date is disabled
isDateDisabled.description_zh: 返回日期是否被禁用的函数

isDateUnavailable.description: A function that returns whether or not a date is unavailable
isDateUnavailable.description_zh: 一个函数，用于返回日期是否不可用

locale.description: The locale to use for formatting dates
locale.description_zh: 用于设置日期格式的区域设置

maxValue.description: The maximum date that can be selected

minValue.description: The minimum date that can be selected

modelValue.description: The controlled checked state of the calendar. Can be bound as v-model.
modelValue.description_zh: 日历的受控检查状态。可以绑定为 V 模型。

multiple.description: Whether or not multiple dates can be selected
multiple.description_zh: 是否可以选择多个日期

numberOfMonths.description: The number of months to display at once

pagedNavigation.description: This property causes the previous and next buttons to navigate by the number of months displayed at once, rather than one month
pagedNavigation.description_zh: 此属性使“上一个”和“下一个”按钮按一次显示的月数（而不是一个月）进行导航

placeholder.description: The placeholder date, which is used to determine what month to display when no date is selected. This updates as the user navigates the calendar and can be used to programmatically control the calendar view
placeholder.description_zh: 占位符日期，用于确定未选择日期时要显示的月份。这将在用户浏览日历时更新，并可用于以编程方式控制日历视图

preventDeselect.description: Whether or not to prevent the user from deselecting a date without selecting another date first
preventDeselect.description_zh: 是否阻止用户在不先选择其他日期的情况下取消选择日期

readonly.description: Whether or not the calendar is readonly

weekdayFormat.description: The format to use for the weekday strings provided via the weekdays slot prop
weekdayFormat.description_zh: 用于通过工作日插槽道具提供的工作日字符串的格式

weekStartsOn.description: The day of the week to start the calendar on

events.name: modelValue
events.description: Event handler called whenever the model value changes
events.description_zh: 每当模型值更改时调用的事件处理程序

events.name: placeholder
events.description: Event handler called whenever the placeholder value changes
events.description_zh: 每当占位符值更改时调用的事件处理程序

slots.name: date
slots.description:
payload: DateValue
The current date of the placeholder
slots.description_zh:
有效负载：DateValue
占位符的当前日期

slots.name: grid
slots.description:
payload: Grid<DateValue>[]
The grid of dates
slots.description_zh:
有效载荷：网格<DateValue>[]
日期网格

slots.name: weekDays
slots.description:
payload: string[]
The days of the week

slots.name: weekStartsOn
slots.description:
payload: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6
The start of the week

slots.name: locale
slots.description_zh:
有效负载：字符串
日历区域设置

slots.name: fixedWeeks
slots.description:
payload: boolean
Whether or not to always display 6 weeks in the calendar
slots.description_zh:
有效载荷：布尔值
是否始终在日历中显示 6 周
